div.bibl: Daily Jewish Courier, June 13, 1919. AMALGAMATED LEADERS CONFER WITH MANUFACTURERS ON THE INCREASE IN WAGES

body.p: Conferences began yesterday morning between the leaders of the Amalgamated the clothing manufacturers regarding the increase that the ready-made tailoring workers were supposed to receive as of June 1, and the special-order workers as of July 1. This conference at the La Salle Hotel will certainly last several days while both sides thoroughly discuss this increase which was a point in the agreement recently made between the union and the manufacturers. The Amalgamated representatives at this conference are International President Sidney Hillman, and Chicago's Amalgamated leaders Frank Rosenbloom, Samuel Levin, and Marion Petro.
